about.title: Why Choose JKK?
about.description: PT. Jaya Karya Kontruksi is a trusted construction company engaged in General Contractor, Batching Plant, and Asphalt Mixing Plant services.

construction.desc: Specialists in Highway, Bridge, Drainage, and Building construction with experienced experts.

profile.title: Company Profile
profile.content1: PT. Jaya Karya Kontruksi is a General Contractor company engaged in road, bridge, drainage, and building construction, including supporting works such as land filling and site preparation. Since its establishment, we have been trusted to handle various construction projects by prioritizing responsibility, precision in execution, and compliance with the terms and conditions set by project owners. Supported by an experienced professional team, we are committed to maintaining the quality of our work while upholding the trust of our partners and clients.
profile.content2: To support the needs of modern infrastructure projects, PT. Jaya Karya Kontruksi has developed material production lines through Batching Plants with two types: Wet Mix and Dry Mix, to meet ready-mix concrete needs flexibly according to project characteristics. Additionally, we also have an Asphalt Mixing Plant (AMP) for hotmix asphalt production, enabling us to provide more integrated services—from material supply to field implementation—with maintained quality standards and consistent quality control.

history.title: Brief History
history.desc: Our journey began from a determination to contribute to regional development until now reaching national strategic projects.

0.event: Established as a small CV in the field of civil works.

1.event: Transformed into a PT and expanded into concrete material procurement services.

2.event: Inaugurated the first modern high-capacity Batching Plant unit.

3.event: Acquired the latest Asphalt Mixing Plant unit to support road paving projects.

vision.title: Vision & Mission
vision.vision_content: PT. Jaya Karya Kontruksi will become one of the quality construction companies with an emphasis on sustainable development growth that competes through human resource development, technology management, and better corporate governance.

mission_items.0: Improving company competitiveness in the construction service industry by developing the best services and technologies to consumers in meeting stakeholder expectations and increasing HR training to produce quality labor and create a conducive work environment, as well as providing broad employment opportunities.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: PT. Jaya Karya Kontruksi
values.content: We value Excellence, Trust, Respect, Empowerment, Accountability, and Mutualism. Consistent Service Quality, and Innovation.

structure.title: Organization Structure
structure.p1: Our organization is professionally managed with clear division of duties to ensure efficiency in every project operation.

asphalt.title: Asphalt Mixing Plant
asphalt.desc: Quality hotmix asphalt production for road paving projects.
asphalt.page_desc: High-quality hotmix asphalt production for road and infrastructure development.
asphalt.content: We provide various types of asphalt mixtures such as AC-WC, AC-BC, AC-Base, and HRS with the best quality. Supported by the latest technology equipment and an experienced team of experts to ensure every product meets road technical standards.
